mapper.select: select nvl(count(*), 0) from tbl_visitor where mate_mem_no=#{mem_no}
mapper.update: update tbl_visitor set visitor_content=#{visitor_content} where visitor_no=#{visitor_no}
mapper.select: select mem_no, mem_email, mem_name from tbl_member where mem_no in (select mem_no from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_visitor where mate_mem_no=#{mate_mem_no} order by visitor_no desc) a) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow} and visitor_status_code=#{visitor_status_code})
